page.title: 02Braintree Industrial Estate
page.content: With the rapid expansion of the towns of Braintree, Bocking and Rayne many new businesses have been started. Some of these took the benefits of the lower rates and enterprise zones allowed by the council during the startup period. Many of these small firms, some only employing a handful of workers are situated on one of the two estates to the west of Braintree. One of these is mainly the small warehouse type business on the Broomhill industrial estate while to the north side of Rayne Road is to be found the Springwood industrial area. This second area is slightly longer established and caters for the larger business premises. Wide roads and easy access, coupled to an overnight lorry park, tend to keep the new industrial centre of Braintree thriving.
